info.title: Cmdop API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Django CFG Demo Project

get.description:
ViewSet for MachineLog operations.

Read-only except for creation. Logs are created by agents.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

post.description:
ViewSet for MachineLog operations.

Read-only except for creation. Logs are created by agents.

get.description:
ViewSet for MachineLog operations.

Read-only except for creation. Logs are created by agents.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Machine Log.

get.description:
ViewSet for Machine operations.

Provides CRUD operations for remote machines with monitoring capabilities.

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

post.description:
ViewSet for Machine operations.

Provides CRUD operations for remote machines with monitoring capabilities.

ViewSet for Machine operations.

Provides CRUD operations for remote machines with monitoring capabilities.

parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Machine.

post.description: Create a public share link for read-only terminal viewing. Only workspace owner or admin can create shares.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Machine.

403.description: Permission denied - only owner/admin can share

get.description: Get all active share links for this machine

parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this Machine.

delete.description: Deactivate all share links for this machine. Only workspace owner or admin can remove shares.

ActiveTerminalSession.description: Serializer for active terminal session info.

Machine.description:
Serializer for Machine model.

All fields are always present in responses.
Read-only fields are explicitly defined to ensure correct OpenAPI schema.

device_id.description: Unique device identifier (UDID for iOS, Android ID for Android)

has_shell.description: Whether device has shell access (false for mobile)

local_ips.description: List of local network IP addresses

is_root.title: Is root/admin
is_root.description: Whether agent is running as root/admin

MachineRequest.description:
Serializer for Machine model.

All fields are always present in responses.
Read-only fields are explicitly defined to ensure correct OpenAPI schema.

device_id.description: Unique device identifier (UDID for iOS, Android ID for Android)

has_shell.description: Whether device has shell access (false for mobile)

is_root.title: Is root/admin
is_root.description: Whether agent is running as root/admin

count.description: Total number of items across all pages

has_next.description: Whether there is a next page

has_previous.description: Whether there is a previous page

next_page.description: Next page number (null if no next page)

previous_page.description: Previous page number (null if no previous page)

results.description: Array of items for current page

PatchedMachineRequest.description:
Serializer for Machine model.

All fields are always present in responses.
Read-only fields are explicitly defined to ensure correct OpenAPI schema.

device_id.description: Unique device identifier (UDID for iOS, Android ID for Android)

has_shell.description: Whether device has shell access (false for mobile)

is_root.title: Is root/admin
is_root.description: Whether agent is running as root/admin

active_sessions_count.description: Count active terminal sessions on this machine.

SharedMachineCreateRequest.description: Serializer for creating a new share.
